text.text: The Lost Worlds is a dinosaurs mod built for the latest verions of Minecraft. It adds dinosaurs to bring back to life, eras to explore, and archaeology.
The Lexicon will tell you everything you need to know about the mod, from creating creatures to exploring ancient time eras.
The Lexicon is split into 4 parts, with each provides information on a particular branch of the mod. They are organised in order of importance of information.
